snippet: As Texas lawmakers say farmers in the Rio Grande Valley are hurting, experts caution that greater attention should be paid to water deep below the surface.
lead_paragraph: As Texas lawmakers say farmers in the Rio Grande Valley are hurting, experts caution that greater attention should be paid to water deep below the surface.

headline.seo: Experts Urge Focus on Aquifers in Push for Water From Mexico
headline.main: Experts Urge Focus on Aquifers in Push for Water From Mexico
headline.print_headline: Experts Urge Focus on Aquifers in Push for Water From Mexico
